SELECT u.*, r.id AS role_id, r.role_name AS role_name, r.role_description AS role_description, org.id AS org_id, org.name AS org_name, org.address AS org_address, org.parent_id AS org_parent_id FROM p_user u LEFT JOIN p_role_user ru ON ru.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN p_role r ON r.id = ru.role_id LEFT JOIN p_organization org ON org.id = u.org_id WHERE 1=1
AND CONCAT(username,nickname,phone) like CONCAT ('%', #{keyword},'%')
AND r.id = #{roleType}
AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{startTime})+ 60*60*24
AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{endTime})+ 60*60*24

SELECT u.*, r.id AS role_id, r.role_name AS role_name, r.role_description AS role_description, org.id AS org_id, org.name AS org_name, org.address AS org_address, org.parent_id AS org_parent_id FROM p_user u LEFT JOIN p_role_user ru ON ru.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN p_role r ON r.id = ru.role_id LEFT JOIN p_organization org ON org.id = u.org_id WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_user ( username, password, nickname, sex, birthday, age, idcard, phone, address ) VALUES (#{username},#{password},#{nickname},#{sex},#{birthday},#{age},#{idcard},#{phone},#{address})
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS roleId, r.role_name AS roleName, r.role_description AS roleDescription FROM p_role r LEFT JOIN p_role_user ru ON ( r.id = ru.role_id ) LEFT JOIN p_user u ON ( ru.user_id = u.id ) WHERE u.username = #{username}

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM p_menu m LEFT JOIN p_role_menu rm ON ( rm.menu_id = m.menu_id ) LEFT JOIN p_role r ON ( r.id = rm.role_id ) LEFT JOIN p_role_user ru ON ( ru.role_id = r.id ) LEFT JOIN p_user u ON ( u.id = ru.user_id ) WHERE u.username = #{username} AND m.perms != ""
